description: This file defines API functions for managing device data, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and pinging devices. It supports both mock data and real backend requests, with helper functions for data normalization and mapping.

methods.name: normalizeServerPagination
methods.description: Converts server response to a normalized pagination shape, handling both paginated and full array responses.

methods.name: listDevices
methods.description: Fetches a list of devices, supporting pagination if backend supports it, or fallback to client-side pagination.

methods.name: getDevice
methods.description: Retrieves a single device by ID from either mock data or backend.

methods.name: createDevice
methods.description: Creates a new device, ensuring uniqueness by name and IP in mock mode, or via backend.

methods.name: updateDevice
methods.description: Updates an existing device by ID, with conflict checks in mock mode, or via backend.

methods.name: deleteDevice
methods.description: Deletes a device by ID, from mock data or backend.

methods.name: pingDevice
methods.description: Simulates or performs a ping to refresh device status, toggling status in mock mode or via backend.
